ListInfo.Name: Role - Software Developer
ListInfo.Description: This list outlines the key responsibilities and duties that a Software Developer is expected to fulfill. It serves as a guideline for task allocation and role expectations.
ListInfo.Instructions: Utilize this list to guide the creation of job descriptions, assess candidate fit during hiring, and allocate tasks to team members efficiently according to the responsibilities outlined.

ListItem.Value: Develop and maintain software applications based on requirements documentation and specifications.
Collaborate with the product team to define software requirements and system architecture.
Write clean, scalable, and well-documented code using best coding practices.
Engage in code reviews to maintain code quality and share knowledge with team members.
Troubleshoot, debug, and upgrade existing software to ensure it's functional and secure.
Test software to ensure responsiveness and efficiency.
Integrate software components and third-party programs to meet specifications.
Document development phases and monitor systems.
Stay up-to-date with new technology trends, programming techniques, and best practices.
